allOf.description: Main properties of the assay experiment template

assay_creator.description: Indicates what site is filling out the assay.

uploader.description: Email address for individual uploading files.

allOf.description: Common properties for NGS Sequencing sxperiments.

library_vendor_kit.description: Vendor for the library construction kit, e.g. KAPA

paired_end_reads.description: Indicate if the sequencing was performed paired or single ended

read_length.description: Number of cycles for each sequencing read

sequencer_platform.description: Sequencer Model, e.g. HiSeq 2500, NextSeq, NovaSeq.

Any file artifact associated with a clinical trial.

file_name.description: The name of the file with extension

object_url.description: URL to artifact within Google Bucket.

uploaded_timestamp.description: Timestamp of when artfiact was loaded into the system.
